title: iraiyADum ATTam idu
sahitya:
iraiyADum ATTam idu bommalATTam tannai maraindingu viLaiyADum cittAlATTam arivAi


anupallavi

  pirai vAzhvil En unakku perum nATTam inda tirai tarum anubhavattAl Eningu manavATTam


caraNam    manam enbadillai ena uNarndOr kuraidIrA manam uNmai tAn enru mAndar mayangugirAr
nanavum kanavum verum nizhalAna paitOTram ena ariyAdadanAl EmATram pOrATTam
ninaittadellAm ingu naDandadillai AnAl ninaittadu naDandadu oru sila vELaiyilE
